description:
When you first decide to learn about iOS programming, let's face it, it's kind of daunting. It feels like there's so much to learn, so much to understand.

There are hundreds of hours worth of training courses out there, but right now, you don't even know if you're going to enjoy programming!

That's why I've created this bite-sized course. To give you a taster of programming Swift, and help you to build a cool Swift project in the space of a couple hours.

Instead of diving head-first into a huge Swift and iOS course, and committing yourself to hundreds of hours of learning, let's dip your toe in the water gently.

In this mini-course all about Swift programming, you're going to create a cool little Swift console app that lets you send SMS text messages from your computer to any phone.

This course is designed to be fun. To get you started with Swift, achieve something cool, and ultimately to help you decide whether this iOS programming stuff is really for you!

Armed with the knowledge you'll get in this course, you can march on to a full-blown iOS course feeling all the more confident.

But remember, this mini-course is about having fun. It's not about stressing yourself and trying to learn every little programming concept we cover off by heart. It's not about getting hung up on the details.

Let's have a little fun, create something cool, prove to yourself that you can do it, and build a nice solid foundation for you to build more Swift knowledge on!

Oh, one last thing... This course is free, and will always be free. You'll never be charged a penny for it.
title: Your First Swift Project - A Swift Tutorial for Beginners
